meanings.definition: The time of day when the sun is highest in the sky; midday.
meanings.sent1: At noontime, the sun shines directly overhead.
meanings.sent3: The cat always naps at noontime, like a little sun clock.
meanings.sent4: The hustle and bustle of the city reaches its peak at noontime.
meanings.sent5: The brightness of the noontime sun can be blinding.

meanings.definition: The period of time around midday; noon.
meanings.sent1: Noontime is the perfect moment for a quick break.
meanings.sent2: The park is peaceful at noontime.
meanings.sent3: The noontime rush at the cafeteria is always chaotic.
meanings.sent4: In the noontime of our lives, we seek clarity and purpose.
meanings.sent5: The noontime shadows grow longer as the day progresses.
